## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the API_REFERENCE.md if APIs changed
- [ ] I have updated the USER_GUIDE.md if user-facing changes were made
- [ ] I have added/updated inline code documentation

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] I have profiled the changes if performance-critical
- [ ] Memory usage has been checked
- [ ] Frame rate impact has been verified (for UI changes)

### Security
- [ ] I have considered security implications
- [ ] No sensitive data is being logged or exposed
- [ ] Input validation has been added where necessary
- [ ] No credentials or secrets are hardcoded

### Accessibility
- [ ] Accessibility labels have been added/updated
- [ ] Changes work with VoiceOver
- [ ] Changes work with Voice Control
- [ ] Dynamic Type is supported
- [ ] Reduce Motion is respected

### Dependencies
- [ ] New dependencies have been justified
- [ ] Package.swift has been updated
- [ ] Dependencies are compatible with minimum OS version
